folder: Harbor Road & Richmond Terrace, Staten Island, NY
text:
69 Harbor Road, east side, between Richmond Terrace and the Staten Island Railroad tracks. Beers's map of 1874, and Robinson's maps of 1898 and 1907 show the house to have belonged to W.V.N. Post.

April 23, 1932.

P.L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Harbor Road - Richmond Terrace

folder: Harbor Road & Richmond Terrace, Staten Island, NY
text:
Harbor Road, west side, south from (No. 12) Richmond Terrace. In the background is visible the Summerfield Methodist Episcopal Church, near the Staten Island Railroad Tracks.

April 23, 1932.

P.L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Harbor Road - Richmond Terrace

folder: Harbor Road & Richmond Terrace, Staten Island, NY
text:
Harbor Road, west side, south of Richmond Terrace, showing a children's playground and the rears of houses fronting on Lockman Avenue.

April 23, 1932

P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Harbor Road - Richmond Terrace

folder: Richmond Terrace & Harbor Road, Staten Island, NY
text:
Richmond Terrace, at the N.E. corner of Harbor Road, showing the Harbor Theatre in a state of disuse.

April 23, 1932.

P.L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Harbor Road
